description: This file defines a utility function `getRFCConfig` within the `Utils` namespace that retrieves RFC configuration parameters using an external function `getRFCParameter`. It includes licensing information, include directives, and a function implementation meant for inline use.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Retrieves RFC configuration parameters by calling the external `getRFCParameter` function and returns true if successful or default value is provided.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
